player.model

Class AbstractGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.model.AbstractGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EliminationGame, LightningGame, PuzzleGame, ReleaseGame

    public abstract class AbstractGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for playing Levels as a specific game mode. Games keep a running count of the current score. Games have an at least one end condition, and a function for ending themselves
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino

        public boolean doMove(AbstractMove move)
        Performs the given move on this game. Updates the score based on the move. Can be overridden to increment a move counter in appropriate game modess
